briefTitle: A Study of Dexlansoprazole Modified Release Formulation to Treat Night Heartburn
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Parallel Group, Placebo Controlled Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy of TAK-390MR (30 mg QD) Compared to Placebo on Relief of Nocturnal Heartburn in Subjects With Symptomatic Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Dexlansoprazole once daily (QD) is effective in treating patients with night heartburn.

primaryOutcome.measure: Median Percentage of Nights Without Heartburn Over 4 Weeks as Assessed by Daily Diary.
